long_description: The Geomate Outdoor/Camping Partycaching combo kit brings the excitement of geocaching and scavenger hunting to your next party or event. For a fun scavenger hunt, hide each cache container along with a hint to find the next cache; searchers must find the final cache to complete the mission. Comes with 5 caches: sprinkler, rock, survival tool, matchbox and lockbox. The Geomate Outdoor/Camping Partycaching combo kit also includes 12 cache treasures, geocaching logbook and a pencil.
short_description: The Geomate Outdoor/Camping Partycaching combo kit brings the excitement of geocaching and scavenger hunting to your next party or event.
